note.name: Directories
note.contents:
A list of other 'Directories' - as in, places where people share as much as they can.

Sourced from Richard Litt's collection repo but heavily curated down to this list:

  • Nikitia Voloboev
  • Azer Ko√ßulu

  • Stephen Whitmore
  • Yoshua Wuyts
  • Stephen McAleese*
